dict.acceptation: 慷慨的，大方的；丰盛的；肥沃的；浓厚的；

sent.orig: It is a love generous inand generous in receiving.
sent.trans: 是一种慷慨的施与，是一种慷慨接受的爱。

sent.orig: This has always seemed generous to me, even overly generous.
sent.trans: 在我看来，这已经很慷慨了，甚至过度慷慨了。

sent.orig: It is the generous giving of ourselves that produces generous harvest.
sent.trans: 只有慷慨的给予才能产生大量的收获。

sent.orig: If a person is very generous, then he must behave himself an emotional generosity.
sent.trans: 如果一个人很慷慨，那他就必须把自己的慷慨表现得充满感情——马里傲普佐原文。

sent.orig: Our very generous host piled our plates with food.
sent.trans: 我们那位非常慷慨的主人将我们的餐碟堆满了食物。
